死に物狂い: (しにものぐるい) - desperation; struggle to the death
死に神: (しにがみ) - god of death; Death
死に絶える: (しにたえる) - to die out; to become extinct
死に至る: (しにいたる) - to bring about death; (as an adjectival phrase) fatal (e.g. disease); thanatophoric
死に至る病: (しにいたるびょう) - deadly disease; sickness unto death
死に花: (しにばな) - a blooming cut flower; glorious death
死に装束: (しにしょうぞく) - burial clothes; clothes worn to commit suicide
死に身: (しにみ) - at the risk of one's life; dead body
死に金: (しにがね) - wasted money; unused money
死に際: (しにぎわ) - verge of death; brink of death
死に顔: (しにがお) - face of a dead person
死に馬: (しにうま) - dead horse; stupid horse/useless horse/crowbait
死ぬ: (shinu) - morrer, falecer; perder o ânimo, perder vigor, parecer morto; cessar, parar
死ぬまで戦う: (しぬまでたたかう) - to fight to the last (death)
死ぬ迄戦う: (しぬまでたたかう) - to fight to the last (death)
死の商人: (しのしょうにん) - merchant of death; arms dealer
死の組: (しのくみ) - group of death; highly competitive group containing too many strong competitors to advance to the next round of a tournament
死の舞踏: (しのぶとう) - dance of death; danse macabre
死を悼む: (しをいたむ) - to mourn over the death of
死んだも同然だ: (しんだもどうぜんだ) - as good as dead; might as well be dead; more dead than alive
死んだ子の年を数える: (しんだこのとしをかぞえる) - (proverb) crying over spilt milk; counting the age of one's dead child
死んでも死にきれない: (しんでもしにきれない) - I can't die and leave things this way
死んでも死に切れない: (しんでもしにきれない) - I can't die and leave things this way
死んでも死に切れぬ: (しんでもしにきれぬ) - I can't die and leave things this way
死んで花実がなるものか: (しんではなみがなるものか) - once you're dead, that's it
死んで花実が咲くものか: (しんではなみがさくものか) - once you're dead, that's it
死中に活を求める: (しちゅうにかつをもとめる) - to search for a way out of a potentially fatal situation; to seek for a way out of a desperate situation
死中求活: (しちゅうきゅうかつ) - (yoji) finding a way out of a potentially fatal situation; seeking a way out of a desperate situation
死亡例: (しぼうれい) - incident of death; fatal case
死亡保険: (しぼうほけん) - death insurance; insurance payable at death
死亡保障: (しぼうほしょう) - death benefit (from life insurance)
死亡届け: (しぼうとどけ) - report of death
死亡広告: (しぼうこうこく) - obituary; notification of death
死亡時刻: (しぼうじこく) - time of death
死亡給付金: (しぼうきゅうふきん) - death benefit
死亡者: (しぼうしゃ) - the deceased; deaths; persons killed
死亡診断書: (しぼうしんだんしょ) - death certificate
死亡証明書: (しぼうしょうめいしょ) - death certificate
死人に口なし: (しにんにくちなし) - dead men tell no tales
死人に口無し: (しにんにくちなし) - dead men tell no tales
死体安置所: (したいあんちじょ) - morgue; mortuary
死体検案書: (したいけんあんしょ) - post-mortem certificate
死体遺棄: (したいいき) - abandoning a corpse; dumping a body
死傷: (ししょう) - casualties; injuries and deaths
死傷者: (ししょうしゃ) - casualties; killed and wounded
死処: (ししょ) - place of death; place to die
死出の旅: (しでのたび) - one's last journey; the journey to the other world; death
死出の田長: (しでのたおさ) - lesser cuckoo (Cuculus poliocephalus)
死刑囚: (しけいしゅう) - criminal condemned to death; convict on death row
死刑場: (しけいじょう) - place of execution
死刑廃止: (しけいはいし) - abolition of the death penalty; abolition of capital punishment
死力を尽くして: (しりょくをつくして) - desperately; to the full extent of one's power; with all of one's ability
死力を尽くす: (しりょくをつくす) - to make frantic efforts
死地: (しち) - (nearly certain) death/extremely dangerous place (or situation) from which one might not return alive; proper place to die; dilemma/predicament/inescapable situation
死守: (ししゅ) - defending to the last; defending desperately
死屍累々: (ししるいるい) - (yoji) heaps of corpses all around
死屍累累: (ししるいるい) - (yoji) heaps of corpses all around
死所: (ししょ) - place of death; place to die
